codePut:
UPDATE SPREMRG SET SPREMRG_STREET_LINE4 =DECODE(:EMERGENCY_STATUS_AGREE,'TRUE', 'REVIEWED ON ' ||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD/MON/YY HH24:MI:SS'),'FALSE',NULL)
WHERE SPREMRG_PIDM = :parm_user_pidm AND SPREMRG_PRIORITY=:SPREMRG_PRIORITY
codeGet:
SELECT SP.SPREMRG_PIDM "ID" ,SP.SPREMRG_PRIORITY, SP.SPREMRG_PRIORITY||'.  '||SP.SPREMRG_FIRST_NAME ||' '|| SP.SPREMRG_MI ||' '|| SP.SPREMRG_LAST_NAME AS EMERGENCY_NAME_DETAILS,
ST.STVRELT_DESC AS EMERGENCY_RELATION_DESC,
'PHONE'||' '||SP.SPREMRG_CTRY_CODE_PHONE||' '||SP.SPREMRG_PHONE_AREA||' '||SP.SPREMRG_PHONE_NUMBER AS EMERGENCY_PHONE_DETAILS,
SP.SPREMRG_STREET_LINE1||' '||SP.SPREMRG_CITY AS EMERGENCY_STREET_ADDRESS ,
SP.SPREMRG_STAT_CODE||' '||SP.SPREMRG_NATN_CODE||SP.SPREMRG_ZIP AS EMERGENCY_ADDRESS_DETAILS,
DECODE(SP.SPREMRG_STREET_LINE4, NULL,'FALSE','TRUE' ) AS EMERGENCY_STATUS_AGREE,
SP.SPREMRG_ACTIVITY_DATE
FROM SPREMRG SP,STVRELT ST
WHERE SP.SPREMRG_PIDM = :parm_user_pidm
AND SP.SPREMRG_RELT_CODE=ST.STVRELT_CODE
ORDER BY SP.SPREMRG_PRIORITY
